messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services, put more police on patrol, restore the pensions' earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces.

messages.title: A clean start
messages.content: Join the campaign for change that works for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reinstate the 8,400 social homes in the South East before building new ones.
Stop outpatient services being moved away from Amersham hospital.
Real change is needed – not treating young people with problems, prisoners in work or training and more police on our streets placing criminals not targets first.
All children deserve the best possible start! A fair share of funds to all schools.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.
issues.education: All children deserve the best possible start! A fair share of funds to all schools.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services.

housing.content: Reinstate the 8,400 social homes in the South East before building new ones.

leaflet.personalStatement: This constituency is my home. I grew up in Amersham, going to Elangeni and Challoners schools. Now I’m a lawyer, living in Chalfont St Giles with my family. As your MP, I’d continue to live permanently in the constituency and work in the Commons to keep in close touch with residents.

quotes.text: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Nick Clegg’s tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

images.caption: Tim Starkey with Nick Clegg and Vince Cable
Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.
Tim Starkey for a fairer tax system

leaflet.additionalNotes: The provided image also includes various headlines and statements regarding the Conservative Party's positions and actions, as well as quotes from news sources critical of their stance on the NHS. There is also a pledge included related to taxes.
